author: Karel Fajkus
comment: UI hell. Mini player obstructs view of e.g. episode list, when you close it, playback stops. No times showed, elapsed, remaining, total, nothing. I didn't download any episodes but downloader keeps suggesting me or some memory cleaner deleted them.

author: Darryl Stark
comment: Downloaded some podcasts at home over WiFi to listen to on my way to work. App then chewed through my mobile data allowance while listening to 'downloaded' podcasts.

author: Jason Edgell
comment: Nice and simple to use, does need the option to limit the amount of downloads stored on your device though.

author: Christoph Read
comment: This is by far my favourite podcast app.

reply.author: Tomas Hubalek
reply.content: Please contact us with details. It looks like you are using some kind of cleaner app that deletes our downloaded data.

title: Best App for Podcasts

author: Steven Osburn
comment: Downloads disappear!  No good on the go.

reply.author: Tomas Hubalek
reply.content: Please make sure you don't use any type of memory cleaner. Those app most likely clear app's data

author: Staman990
comment: Easy.  Great

author: hunter haller
comment: Hunter Haller

author: Maxwell Owusu
comment: Safe to use
title: Faster and efficient

author: Emmanuel N Tetteh
comment: Thanks
title: Its  cool

author: Stanislav Bocinec
comment: i was a loyal premium PtG user,however, the fact that app is superbuggy on my Moto G, i gave up and moved to podcast addict. The bugs makes daily use of the app very uncomfortable and useless. Anyway, best luck with development, maybe once will return back ;)

reply.author: Tomas Hubalek
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback. I'm sorry you went to podcasts addict. Please contact us by email with your concerns. We will consider to fix the issues.

title: Moved to podcastaddict

author: Matic Lenko
comment: I just cannot completely close the app, either I can't figure out how, or the exit button doesn't work, it satys in notification bar forever unless i restart my Sony Xperia z3 compact
title: Great app with minor bugs

author: John Palmasano
comment: App ran up 1.25 gbs of data while running in the background. Must have been a glitch. Wasn't downloading anything. Will delete.
title: App ran up 1.25 gbs of data in 10 mins

author: Keren Landsman
comment: Gets stuck after one episode and won't play the next. Can't shut down after being stuck.
title: Problematic app

author: Shane N
comment: Don't like it does not pauses when other audio comes up like wazes or maps.  The way a round it, does not make total sence to me.
title: It's okay

author: Matko
comment: Apart from stuttering (which I'm sure can be fixed) it is the best in terms of simplicity and functionality when it comes to free podcast apps.
title: The essence of a good app.

author: Yvonne Stack
comment: Its the best quality and most user friendly I have tried so far. And i have tried MANY.
title: THE BEST I HAVE EVER TRIED

author: Anna Buckley
comment: Bugs galore

author: Anthony Gardin
comment: This app is great for me, I only have 3-4 podcasts subscribed. Easy to use not bloated with features I won't use
title: Works well, not too cluttered

comment: BestOne

author: 8WAYRUN
comment: App at first glance is fantastic. It operates very well and is easy to use. However, there are a few specific things missing from making it a "GREAT" app.  Firstly, it does not play video for video podcasts; this app is audio only. Secondly, there is no easy way to "fast forward". To bring up the "scroll bar", you must first pause the currently playing audio; then the scroll bar pops up. Of course, after you then click play, the scroll bar never goes away.

author: Cannonball Teacup
comment: Ok...this app was downloaded and unicorns were born and angels floated from the heavens for giving me an app for podcasts that isn't cluttered and just works. Clean design with functionality. Pause button is in a wonky spot and I can't find a download all option.
title: Finally

author: Poetic Art
comment: I will recommend this app to all the android user's :)
title: Great podcast app, simple and easy to used.

author: Jayme Dimmick
comment: Really easy to use podcast catcher. Easy to find and download my favorite pods. I would rate 5 stars if there were a timer counter and ability to use chapters for pods that support it.
title: Easy to use

author: Bridget Shanahan
comment: Great app for podcasts! I'm able to set up subscriptions so they automatically download when a new one is released. It's really great! Next step for improvement is to choose when the podcasts are deleted. Once I listen to it, it's deleted. Sometimes I listen to them over again. It would be nice to keep the top 3 podcasts until a new one is dowloaded.

author: Mitchell Coushman
comment: This app is a pretty solid app, but there are a few bugs and other things that should be fixed, such as occasionally stopping what's being played and not being able to play anything after, had to uninstall and then reinstall to fix that problem.
title: Great

author: Aysel Aliyeva
comment: Absolutely love it.Great job!

author: Michael Bury
comment: Installed now.  But getting "FileNotFound" exception for any attempted podcast download.  Any ideas?

reply.author: Tomas Hubalek
reply.content: Please don't user Cache cleaner on your device. Cache cleaner most likely removed downloaded podcasts.

title: Samsung Galaxy Note 3

author: Jorge Savoff
comment: Exiting out if it is a different matter. App stays in notification bar without the option to choose it. A reboot was needed, Nexus 5 running 5.1.1 stock
title: Plays fine..

author: Diego S. Mathais
comment: Cumpre o prometido faz att dos podcast automático , o player é muito bom e uma interface bem dinâmica , NerdCast , SciCast , Dragões de Garagem entre outros , só não dei 5 prq não encontrei o arquivo mp3 no meu cartão ...
title: Muito Bom !!!

author: Vojtěch Hodek
comment: pomocí Google účtu by se hodila.

reply.author: Tomas Hubalek
reply.content: Je naprogramovaná, ale zatím jsem ji odstranil, protože nefungovala 100% spolehlivě.

title: Synchronizace

author: Phil Honeywell
comment: This is a really strong podcast app. Great download features and strong playback.
title: Excellent App

author: Matt Thompson
comment: Good Potential but a Work in Progress

author: Tony Sahm
comment: I like the interface so far.  Easy navigation to popular podcasts, even introducing me to a few I was unaware of in different genres.  I wish the search/keyword  were a little more evident.  I was also hoping that I could have the option to limit the number of podcasts to store, for example, maybe only keep the 2 or 3 most recent, to save on storage, but I am sure that could be provided in the future.  It looks like they are working on saving to external SD card so that will be great when implemented.  One question, after I mark a podcast as read, is it deleted?

reply.author: Tomas Hubalek
reply.content: Thanks for your review. Working on fixes, please stay tuned. Regarding delete of podcasts: there is something like trashcan. So they are not deleted immediately but quite soon after episode is marked as listened.

title: nice interface so far

author: Laurence Smith
comment: Rss feed functionality is great, clean functional UI, features are primitive. Performance issues (GS4) and hangups are often. So far nice needed step (BETA)

reply.author: Tomas Hubalek
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback. Please contact us by email to give more info about performance issues.

title: Potential

author: night stitcher
comment: So far I like the interface, but podcasts are saved to internal storage, which is short on space, instead of the external SD card, where there's lots of room. There should be a configuration setting to select the exact location for saving podcast files.

reply.author: Tomas Hubalek
reply.content: Working on it, please stay tuned.

title: Need ability to choose folder for podcast files

author: Shane McKinney
comment: I can't seem to be able to get the app to save to the SD card. Can someone please tell me how? Thanks!

reply.author: Tomas Hubalek
reply.content: SD card support was added in version 0.6.11. Please update,

title: Save to SD card?

author: Samantha Daigneault
comment: There is no way to delete downloaded podcasts (or view them in a "library"), and no way to view or change things you have marked as "Listened To" in case you want to replay them or made a mistake. I love the app but missing these features makes it almost unusable long term. Keep working though!

reply.author: Tomas Hubalek
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback. Downloaded podcasts are deleted quite soon when marked as listened (there is something like trashcan). If you start download them immediately then they are taken from trashcan if they are still there.

title: important missing feature!

author: Dan MacDonald
comment: Locked up my S5 after download. Had to Uninstall to return to normal....I guess  we need some work

reply.author: Tomas Hubalek
reply.content: Working on it, please stay tuned.

title: Immediately froze

author: Steven Kinley
comment: Please, please, hire a professional designer with good UI experience/skills. The attempt at material design appreciated but falls way short of what it should be.

reply.author: Tomas Hubalek
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback. Streaming playback is supported (as you can see on 4th screenshot on Play Store). Open episode and click on Stream button. Regarding Material Design: app never stated it has Material Design.

title: Horrible UI, can't stream

author: Rufino Adorno
comment: Seems to have potential but unstable at this time. From LG-G3.

reply.author: Tomas Hubalek
reply.content: Will be hopefully fixed in next release. Thanks for your feedback.

title: Stops while downloading podcasts.
